overview: The students of the University of Guanajuato also known as the bees, carried out a state strike due to the lack of commitment that their institution has in matters of security. They managed to create a movement that asserted its voice and struggle in society; This event generated a complete change in the way of seeing and making student protests.
tagline: A megaphone for those who lived through this struggle closely and so that it is not forgotten. #NotABeeLess
title: The Beehive
